full_summary:
**Cleaning Services (Manitoba)**[^1]
===============

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01006223 (Manitoba)
--------------------

**Amendment Number**: 3

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: September 6, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EDST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposals

### Description

The National Research Council Canada is requesting proposals from qualified Service Providers to provide Cleaning Services in accordance with the detailed Statement of Work attached as Appendix "A". Private commercial office spaces will be cleaned and maintained according to the designated contract terms and conditions.

A Site Visit is scheduled for September 15, 2022. The Clean Agency will clarify any contracts-related concessions.

### Procurement Scopes

*   **GSIN (General Services Information Network) Code**: K100A - Cleaning and Maintenance, Janitorial
*   **Global Trade Agreement**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba

### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Tania Backes
*   **Email**: tania.backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 613-410-3834
*   **Fax**: None

### Attachments

The Request for Proposals can be obtained from the Canadian Government eBuy Platform:

*   English version: [PDF Link 1](link to the PDF file), [PDF Link 2](link to the PDF file), [PDF Link 3](link to the PDF file), [PDF Link 4](link to the PDF file)
*   French version: [PDF Link 1](link to the French PDF file), [PDF Link 2](link to the French PDF file), [PDF Link 3](link to the French PDF file), [PDF Link 4](link to the French PDF file)

Please be  slow and careful to as the content of the attachments without opening them and try to keep your answer as short as possible
